item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:5, topic:437880”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=540595.msg3959131#msg3959131 date=1333088052]
Keeping a cache of all items the player has accessible to them with the widget id is a great way to prevent dupes iirc
[/quote]

not that I have any idea what you are trying to say here, but clearly any method that create or generates new should be checked carefully for any unauthorized usage. Also it has been thrown around that you can assign each item a uid which would allow tracking and removal of duplicated items.[/quote]

A hash table where the widget id is mapped to an item array is what I was referring to. Assigning a UID to items on creation would be interesting because it poses methods of tracking as well.

Read full topic

item.title: Nvm
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Making a object disappear is not as bad as duping. I do believe most dupes, if not all, are generally fixed in good servers. Any server that I use, I delete all packets that I don’t use. Makes for things like this to (most likely) not happen.

Read full topic
